name: Steve Gamlin
what_you_do: As a Keynote Speaker, Visualization Coach and Creator of the Vision Board Mastery learning program, my mission is simple: Leave as many situations (and peoples' lives) better than I find them.
who_you_serve: Entrepreneurs stuck in the Hustle and Grindset™ lifestyle who want to build a life that actually works for them.
social_proof: Testimonials from clients Lisa B., Lynn C., and Scott F.
business_focus: Help entrepreneurs stuck in the Hustle and Grindset™ lifestyle build a life that actually works for them.
service_provided: keynote speaking, visualization coaching, vision board mastery program
